content: 2 double_crochet in next hole then 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working 3 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 54 stitches round 17 3 chain as 1st double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 27 holes round 18 3 chain 2 double_crochet in next hole then 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working 3 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 56 stitches round 19 3 chain 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 28 holes rounds 20-27 repeat rounds 18 and 19 round 28 change color and work scallop edging *1 single_crochet skip 2 stitches make 5 double_crochet in 1 stitch skip 2 stitches 1 single_crochet repeat from * around join to 1st single_crochet with a st st finish off © vendula maderska 2013 the patterns are intended for personal use only that means none commercial purposes all rights reserved you are not allowed neither to sell copy share translate to another language and publish the patterns or parts of it sell the creation made from these patterns without particularly permission of the author if you have any questions feel free to ask on this e-mail vendula maderska@seznam cz thank you ♥ february 2013 11 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com right sleeve size 3 years old work in rounds shaping as for left sleeve and working throughout in one round of double_crochet followed by one round of holes use the same color sequence as on the yoke for the double_crochet rounds but work every hole round in light pink rounds 1-19 work same way as size 5 years old round 20 change to edging color and work one round of single_crochet round 21 make a scallop edging *1 single_crochet skip 2 stitches work 5 double_crochet in the next stitch skip 2 stitches work 1 single_crochet in next stitch* repeat from * to end of round join to 1st single_crochet with a st st and finish off right sleeve size 3 year old child finishing both sizes work one round single_crochet around the front and neckline edges skipping every 5th stitch along the neck edge to give the neckline a better look and fit work a second round to scallop the edges as given for sleeves *1 single_crochet skip 2 stitches work 5 double_crochet in the next stitch skip 2 stitches 1 single_crochet repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet and finish off
